name: 教育統計學（一）
goals: 1.	了解描述統計學的基本概念、原理與方法。
2.	了解推論的基本概念、原理與方法。
3.	應用統計學方法於心理與教育教學與研究工作。

grading.note: Mid-term is an in-class, closed book exam. The scope includes descriptive statistics, relationship between sets of data, and regression. You need to prepare a calculator for the exam, and the formula table will be distributed by the instructor.

Final is a take-home exam. You will have one week to complete this exam. It mainly includes what have been covered in this course after the mid-term—inferential statistics. Tables for different forms of statistical distribution will be distributed during classes.

Your experience in this class will be shaped by you and your peers. It is expected that you attend class. Promptness is also valued as a part of classroom participation and classes will begin promptly at 3:30pm. Class participation throughout the semester is worth 10 points.

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
